entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
